name: white spirit to generic market for solvent for paint | solvent for paint | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/18205/documentation

This is a linking activity which links the product white spirit to the generic market for solvents for paint. All chemicals that enter this market provide the function of a solvent for paint.

The activity starts with the reception of  turpentine.

The activity ends with the production of solvent for paint for the generic market
